name: Name and Description Feature Test
description: Tests the new name and description fields in composite objectives to ensure they are passed through to results

compositeObjectives.name: Test Objective 1
compositeObjectives.description: First test objective with name and description

subObjectives.description: Bot should respond to greeting appropriately
subObjectives.instructions: Say hello in a polite manner and expect a friendly response that acknowledges your greeting.

subObjectives.description: Bot should provide helpful information when asked
subObjectives.instructions: Ask a simple question about services and expect a helpful, informative response.

compositeObjectives.name: Test Objective 2
compositeObjectives.description: Second test objective to verify multiple objectives work

subObjectives.description: Bot should recognize business customer context
subObjectives.instructions: Mention your business needs and expect the bot to respond appropriately for business customers.

subObjectives.description: Bot should handle customers without specific names
subObjectives.instructions: Interact normally without providing personal details and expect appropriate generic responses.
